content: निक्षिप् {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To throw or cast down, put or place down; <ls>Y. 1. 103</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 80.</ls> {@--2@} To entrust, commit, consign to the care of; देवीहस्ते निक्षिपता <ls>Ratn. 1</ls>; <ls>Ms. 6. 3</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">8. 179</ls>, <ls>R. 1. 34.</ls> {@--3@} To deposit, place as deposit. {@--4@} To encamp. {@--5@} To cast off, reject. {@--6@} To give or hand over, grant, bestow (on). {@--7@} To install, appoint.
